This will remove your Datawrapper accoun:
This will remove your Datawrapper account. The charts you created so far 
will remain visible in places where you embedded them.
Yes, I really know what I'm doing: Sí, realmente sé lo que estoy haciendo
Think about it one more time. Have you c:
Think about it one more time. Have you considered all the consequences of 
deleting your account?
Ya no puedes ingresar ni cerrar sesión.
You cannot edit or remove your charts an: Ya no puedes editar o remover tus gráficos.
Note that this will only delete your acc:
Note that this will only delete your account. Your charts will not be 
removed. If you want to remove your charts, please do it manually.
Please enter your password to confirm th: Por favor ingresa tu clave y confirma tu solicitud de eliminación:
Do you still <b>really<\/b> want to dele: ¿Todavía really quieres eliminar tu cuenta de Datawrapper?
Hi, good to see you. Now please pick a p: Hola, nos alegramos de verte. Ahora, por favor elige una contraseña para completar el registro.
For security reasons we ask you to provi:
For security reasons we ask you to provide your current password. Please 
make sure you use a strong password.
For security reasons, please provide you: For razones de seguridad, por favor provee tu clave actual.
Filling out your profile is optional. If:
Filling out your profile is optional. If you do, you can display these 
information below the charts you publish.
Your email address has been updated!: Your email address has been updated!

This is the email address which you use as login and to which we send 
notification emails.
Name: Nombre
Add a website that contains more informa:
Add a website that contains more information about you (e.g. your blog). 
Optionally you can display these information below you published charts.

El enlace a restablecer tu clave es válido.
Ahora por favor ingresa una nueva clave.
The password should contain at least fou: La clave debiera contener al menos cuatro caracteres

<b>CAUTION!<\/b> This chart belongs to <: CAUTION! This chart belongs to %email. Great power comes with great responsibility, so be careful with what you're doing!
Make sure the data looks right: Make sure the data looks right
Please make sure that Datawrapper interp:
Please make sure that Datawrapper interprets your data correctly. In the 
table number columns should be shown in blue, dates in green and text in 
black.
Where did you get the data?: Where did you get the data?
If possible, please provide a link the s: Si es posible, por favor provee un enlace a la fuente de datos
What do you want to do with this chart?: What do you want to do with this chart?
Congratulations, you created your first: Congratulations, you created your first chart!
Now, to be able to embed the chart, we a: Ahora, para poder incrustar el gráfico, necesitamos que crees una cuenta. Es gratis y todo lo que necesitas es una dirección de correo válida. El gráfico que acabas de crear será transferido a tu nueva cuenta.
It all starts with your data...
Select your data (including header row\/:
Select your data (including header row/column) in Excel or OpenOffice and 
paste it in the text field on the right. You can also upload a CSV file from 
your computer.
Learn more about how to upload your data: Aprende más sobre cómo subir tus datos

If you just want to try Datawrapper, heres a list of some example datasets

Title: Title
You are using a browser that is not supp:
You are using a browser that is not supported at the moment. Please use one 
of the following browsers instead. Note that this only applies to the chart 
editor. The charts itself can be viewed with any major browser.
Datawrapper is an <a href=\"http:\/\/git: Datawrapper is an open source project by ABZV - a German training institution for newspaper journalists.

Looking for the old beta version of Data:
Looking for the old beta version of Datawrapper?
It's still available at beta.datawrapper.de
Mira lo que has creado hasta ahora.
We're glad to see you again. Login to ac:
We're glad to see you again. Login to access your charts, and create new 
ones.
Datawrapper is 100&#37; free and creatin:
Datawrapper is 100% free and creating an account takes less than a 
minute. Just enter your email and pick a password, and you're done!
Alternatively you can sign in via:: Alternatively you can sign in via:

[resize iFrame to chart]
Your password doesn't meet our security:
Your password doesn't meet our security guidelines. Please provide at least 
4 characters.
The password and the repeated password m: La clave y la clave repetida no pueden diferir.
Awesome charts need awesome data. If you:
Awesome charts need awesome data. If you just want to try out things you can 
select one of our sample datasets.

Do you really want to delete the chart? Note that after deleting this chart 
won't be embedable any more.
Este correo electrónico no ha sido registrador aún.
The password reset email has already bee: The password reset email has already been sent. Please contact an administrator.

Datawrapper: You requested a reset of yo: Datawrapper: You requested a reset of your password
You should soon receive an email with fu: Pronto recibirás un correo electrónico con más instrucciones.
You already resent the activation mail t: You already resent the activation mail three times, now. Please contact an administrator to proceed with your account activation.
Datawrapper: Please activate your email: Datawrapper: Please activate your email address
The activation email has been send to yo: The activation email has been send to your email address, again.
You're account is probably already activ: Es probable que tu cuenta ya haya sido activada.

Both passwords must be the same.

Welcome to your new Datawrapper account.

The password could not be changed becaus:
The password could not be changed because your old password was not entered 
correctly.
Datawrapper: You requested a change of y: Datawrapper: You requested a change of your email address
To complete the change of your email add:
To complete the change of your email address, you need to confirm that you 
have access to it. Therefor we sent an email with the confirmation link to 
your new address. Your new email will be set right after you clicked that 
link.
This just worked fine. Your profile has: Esto funcionó bien. Tu perfil ha sido actualizado.
La clave que ingresaste no es correcta.
La clave no puede estar vacía.
The supplied token for password resettin: El enlace provisto para restablecer la contraseña es inválido.
Hello %name%,\n\nThank you for signing u:
Hello %name%,

Thank you for signing up at Datawrapper on %domain%!

Please click on the following link to activate your email address.
%activation_link%

You're account won't be activated until you click the link above.

If you're not able to click the link above, copy it and paste it into your 
web browser. If you have trouble with this please FORWARD this email to 
%support_email% and state that you had problems activating your account.

Best regards,
The Datawrapper Team
Hello %name%,\n\nYou have recently asked:
Hello %name%,

You have recently asked for a change of your email address for your 
Datawrapper account from %old_email% to %new_email%.

To complete this change you need to click on the following link:
%email_change_token_link%

You're email address won't be changed until you click the link above.

If you're not able to click the link above, copy it and paste it into your 
web browser. If you have trouble with this please FORWARD this email to 
%support_email% and state that you had problems changing your email 
address.

Best regards,
The Datawrapper Team

Please ignore this email if you received it by accident.

Please do not share this email. The activation link is secret.
Hello %name%,\n\nSomeone just created an:
Hello %name%,

Someone just created an account for you on %domain%.

To activate the account and choose a password please click on the following 
link:
%invitation_link%

Your new account won't be activated until you click the link above.

If you're not able to click the link above, copy it and paste it into your 
web browser. If you have trouble with this please FORWARD this email to 
%support_email% and state that you had problems activating your account.

Best regards,
The Datawrapper Team
Hello %name%,\n\nSomeone, probably you,:
Hello %name%,

Someone, probably you, filed a request to reset your password.

If that's true, please click the following link to reset your password.

%password_reset_link%

If you ignore this email, your password stays the same as before.

Best,
Datawrapper
The page you are looking for could not b:
The page you are looking for could not be found. Check the address bar to 
ensure your URL is spelled correctly. If all else fails, you can visit our 
home page at the link below.
Sorry, but it seems that the chart you w:
Sorry, but it seems that the chart you want to see is not quite ready for 
the world, yet. Why don't you just relax and wait a minute?

Sorry, but it seems that the chart you want to see has already passed away 
because its author decided to delete it.
Whoops! You're not allowed to publish ch: ¡Uuuups! No tienes permiso para publicar gráficos, aún
Sorry, but it seems that your account is: Sorry, but it seems that your account is not ready to publish charts, yet.
If you created the chart as a guest, you: If you created the chart as a guest, you should sign up for a free account now. In case you already did that, you probably still need to activate you e-mail address by clicking on that activation link we sent you.
Sorry, but it seems that there is no cha: Lo sentimos, pero parece que no hay un gráfico con el id <b>
Sorry, but the requested chart belongs t: Lo sentimos, pero el gráfico solicitado pertenece a otra persona.
Por favor comprueba si estás registrado.
Good news is, sign up is free and takes: Good news is, sign up is free and takes less than 20 seconds.
Guess what, in order to edit your user p:

create yourself an account.

link and try again.
Contact someone of our friendly <a href=: Contact someone of our friendly administrators and ask for help with the password reset process.
There is no user with the given user id.

You already resent the activation mail t: You already resent the activation mail three times, now. Please contact an administrator to proceed with your account activation.
The password could not be changed becaus:

correctly.
To complete the change of your email add:

email \/ activation:
Hello %name%,

Thank you for signing up at Datawrapper on %domain%!

Please click on the following link to activate your email address.
%activation_link%

You're account won't be activated until you click the link above.

If you're not able to click the link above, copy it and paste it into your web browser. If you have trouble with this please FORWARD this email to %support_email% and state that you had problems activating your account.

Best regards,
The Datawrapper Team
email \/ change-email:
Hello %name%,

You have recently asked for a change of your email address for your Datawrapper account from %old_email% to %new_email%.

To complete this change you need to click on the following link:
%email_change_token_link%

You're email address won't be changed until you click the link above.

If you're not able to click the link above, copy it and paste it into your web browser. If you have trouble with this please FORWARD this email to %support_email% and state that you had problems changing your email address.

Best regards,
The Datawrapper Team

upload \/ headline: It all starts with your data...

login \/ login \/ intro:
We're glad to see you again. Login to access your charts, and create new 
ones.
login \/ signup \/ intro:
Datawrapper is 100% free and creating an account takes less than a 
minute. Just enter your email and pick a password, and you're done!
login \/ alternative signin: Alternatively you can sign in via:
login \/ signup \/ confirmation-email: Thanks for signing up for Datawrapper! Please check your email inbox for our welcome email and click the activation link to complete signup.
login \/ signup \/ confirmation-email-hi: If you do not see an email within five minutes, please make sure to also check the spam folder in your email program.
